summary: Documentary on reported Conservative bias of the Rupert Murdoch-owned Fox News Channel (FNC), which promotes itself as "Fair and Balanced". Material includes interviews with former FNC employees and the inter-office memos they provided.
cast: Roger Ailes|Eric Alterman|Christiane Amanpour|Harry Belafonte|David Brock|Tom Brokaw|George W. Bush|Carl Cameron|George Carlin|Neil Cavuto|Douglas Cheek|Dick Cheney|Richard Clarke|Jeff Cohen|Alan Colmes|Walter Cronkite|Laurie Dhue|Steve Doocy|Jon Du Pre|Susan Estrich|Al Franken|Newt Gingrich|Jeremy Glick|Sean Hannity|Brit Hume|Molly Ivins|Peter Jennings|Ted Kennedy|John Kerry|Brian Kilmeade|Mike Malloy|Rupert Murdoch|John Nichols|Bill O'Reilly|Dan Rather|Ronald Reagan|Condoleezza Rice|Geraldo Rivera|Bernie Sanders|Martin Sheen|Shepard Smith|Jon Stewart|Cal Thomas|Greta Van Susteren|Linda Vester|Av Westin
title: Outfoxed: Rupert Murdoch's War on Journalism
